attributes.action: buy back MG Rover & other BL Companies gone bust for the pride of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Years ago Britain was an industrial Giant with BL, British Stelle etc but due to weak governments and joining the EU They all went bust and we need that pride back for the sake of the uk, thats why we have yobs etc cause we have no pride.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
